description:
Buongiorno!

This is the Italian Audio Dictionary from iLoveLingo.com. It will help you spell and pronounce every word that is included.

Instead of cramming every Italian word there is into this dictionary, it focuses on the 500 words you're most likely to use and adds audio to every one of them. It is thus an excellent travel-companion.

FEATURES:
- ALL words have audio!
- Alphabetically sorted by English and Italian.
- Very user-friendly navigation.

For more language apps, please visit iLoveLingo.com.

Benvenuto!
*LIMITATIONS LITE-VERSION: - Only sorts Italian words alphabetically.*
